```{r knitr-setup, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  cache = TRUE,
  out.width = "100%",
  fig.align = 'center',
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.asp = 0.618,  # 1 / phi
  fig.show = "hold",
  size = "tiny"
)
```



# Load packages

```{r load-libs, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)  # data wrangling
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
```



# Show case

```{r}
d <- head(iris[,1:3])
grid.table(d)
```
